attributes.action: Change the 18 rating on Netflix's '13 Reasons Why' to 15
attributes.additional_details: By rating the series an 18, it limits the TARGET audience of the book and the series in the first place. Typically, a rated 18 is accessible for adults only. This material focuses on a teenagers traumatic experience at her high school where she experiences bullying and ends up committing suicide. I believe this content, although distressing, should be accessible for teenagers to become aware of the consequences of bullying and the awareness to mental health and suicide.
attributes.background: Netflix's original series '13 Reasons Why' is an adaption of the young adult novel by Jay Asher; about a 17 year old girls suicide and her history of bullying at her high school. It's rated 18. I want the certificate to change to a 15 to allow the audience it's INTENDED FOR to watch and access it.

rejection.details: The British Board of Film Classification is responsible for the certification of this series. You can find out more here: http://www.bbfc.co.uk/what-classification/digital-age-ratings
